segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to see it just pouring out like that, making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it's just going to get worse if she doesn't do something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just ignoring it or if she really hasn't noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Either way, it's gross to watch this happen and not be able to do anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's going on soon and cleans up that mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a bit revolting, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR
